description:
** One of the 500 Best Apps in the world, as chosen by The Sunday Times! **
** Over a million downloads! **

Play fun, innovative puzzles and train your brain with A Clockwork Brain!

Discover a series of unique mini-games especially created to test various cognitive abilities such as visual, spatial, logic, language, arithmetic, and memory.  Everything in the game has been lovingly hand-painted with influences from Victorian Steampunk and Mayan art. 

Sprocket, the robot, will be your guide! Let the games begin! 

[PRESS REVIEWS] 
• "I’m really digging A Clockwork Brain in the same way I love the Brain Age series on Nintendo DS [...] The cool Victorian-inspired Steampunk aesthetic only adds to the enjoyment of the game.” – G4TV 
• “A fantastic collection of brain teasers [...] no two ever feel alike.” – Gamezebo 
• “The world’s most authentic simulation of studying in a Steampunk classroom taught by a brass-plated robot.” – Pocketnext 

[PLAYER REVIEWS] 
• "Instant fun!" 
• "Great game! My brain is sore from working out!" 
• I had several brain games apps. But this one won out by being the only one I enjoy playing EVERY day!
• "So fun and challenging....officially addicted....getting nothing else done this weekend!"
• “Absolutely Love this game. So far I have referred 3 of my friends to play this game. Different puzzles every time you play! It never gets boring :)”
• “I’ve never written an app review before... But this game is worth it. The value is amazing. Just don't plan on going anywhere for a while, because you'll be glued.”
• “I will admit that this application is beyond anything else, it is the best app I have had on my device. I have given it one trillion stars, it is definitely recommended for intellect and brain training.”

 [FEATURES] 
• Enjoy four free, addictive mini-games! 
• Get challenged with bite-sized, fast-paced gameplay full of brain-training goodness! 
• Collect Tokens as you play and unlock special Upgrades! 
• Train every day and win even more Tokens with Daily Rewards! 
• Play a mini-game on its own, or pick four in a Challenge Mode game to really boost your score!
• Compete with others on Game Center and collect great Achievements! 
• Sharpen those verbal skills with nine languages! (English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Swedish, Greek) 
• Expand your brain-games collection by purchasing Premium Game Packs! 
• See how long you can survive in the fiendishly difficult Insane Round for even higher scores! 
• Try all Premium Games for FREE with Tokens!
• Purchase the new Mega Pack and unlock all premium games at a discount!

[INCLUDED FREE MINI-GAMES] 
• Scrolling Silhouettes: Trains Visual/Spatial Ability 
• Anagrams: Trains Language Processing 
• Missing Tiles: Trains Arithmetic 
• Chase the Numbers: Trains Memory 
• Size Matters (Unlockable Bonus): Trains Visual/Spatial Ability 

[PREMIUM MINI-GAMES] 
• Word Length: Trains Language Processing 
• Sculpt Away: Trains Memory 
• Directions: Trains Visual/Spatial Ability 
• Points of View: Trains Logic 
• Label It!: Trains Language Processing 
• What Has Changed: Trains Memory 
• Speed Match: Trains Reflexes 
• Logic Tiles: Trains Logic

On the lookout for free Sprocket Tokens? Then make sure you allow our notifications to reach you. They will let you know about daily super Token rewards, and game discounts. 

Purchasing premium content will remove all ads from the game. 

Want to transfer your purchased Game Packs to another device? Go to Premium Upgrades, scroll to the end and tap on Restore Purchases.
--------------------------------------- 
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/TEGames 
Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TotalEclipse 
Follow us on Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/TotalEclipseGames
trackCensoredName: Clockwork Brain - Challenge your Mind with Fun Puzzles!
trackName: Clockwork Brain - Challenge your Mind with Fun Puzzles!
releaseNotes:
Hello Sprocket fans!

Your favorite game has been updated with some improvements and bug fixes:

[Improvements]
▶ Difficulty re-balanced in all 13 mini-games
▶ Three new Leaderboards: Total Games Played, Total Flawless Games, Max Streak
▶ Support for iOS 8

[Bug Fixes]
▶ Serious crash fix for a lot of devices running iOS 8
▶ Scores larger than 300K will now be saved in Game Center normally
▶ Various bug fixes

We also have great news for you! We have been working on our very own infrastructure, in order to bring you:

▶ A seamless experience among all your iOS devices (includes auto-syncing of your Sprocket Tokens)
▶ The ability to challenge your friends and earn even more Sprocket Tokens
▶ An updated Upgrades store where you will be able to use your collected Sprocket Tokens to unlock additional mini-games

These amazing enhancements, along with new mini-games will be rolling out in the following months, so stay tuned!
